Changelog
=========

1.1.1 (2012 - 12 - 4)
----------------------

- Bug error on non time zone aware plone dates
  [ramon]


1.1 (2012 - 11 - 21)
--------------------

- Adding the hashtag feature so all commits to hootsuite have a pre-defined hashtag
  [ramon]

1.0 (2012 - 09 - 27)
--------------------

- Initial version that allows to commit to hootsuite on document publication or schedulled publication using publication data
  [ramon]
